altername_name: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom
Ni no Kuni II: L'Avènement d'un Nouveau Royaume: PRINCE'S EDITION
Ni no Kuni II: Schicksal Eines Königreichs: Prince’s Edition
name: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom: Prince's Edition
overview: Join the young king, Evan, as he sets out on an epic quest to found a new kingdom and save his world. The Prince's Edition includes the full game and all DLCs. Lose yourself in the ultimate Ni no Kuni experience with this Prince's Edition including: • Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom (full game) • Expansions that add hours of additional gameplay • Prince's Equipment Pack Join the young king, Evan, as he sets out on an epic quest to found a new kingdom, unite his world, and save its people from a terrible evil. Embark on this unforgettable adventure, which blurs the line between animated feature film and video game. Developed by LEVEL-5, Ni no Kuni II features enchanting character design from the legendary artist Yoshiyuki Momose and a stirring soundtrack composed by the world-famous Joe Hisaishi.
